name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-peoplepicker
title: People Picker Web Part
shortDescription: SharePoint Framework solution with the Office UI Fabric People Picker, the client web part across the SharePoint Rest API is able to retrieve people and groups.
longDescription: SharePoint Framework solution with the Office UI Fabric People Picker, the client web part across the SharePoint Rest API is able to retrieve people and groups.

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
